content: You have a fishing rod? Great, yeep~. Just now, a huge fish snapped the line on mine. Can I count on you to exact my revenge?
info: 日常对话-日常引入语-非首次对话-2-9次对话-玩家手持钓竿-1005幻雪_引入语

content: When I saw you running over with your fishing rod, I thought I heard all the fish swim away... Next time, if you want to even catch a glimpse of any fish, you'll need to move more quietly.
info: 日常对话-日常引入语-非首次对话-2-9次对话-玩家手持钓竿-1005幻雪_引入语
